articles.description: Just as Casper Ruud was about to serve at the French Open, a “climate activist” ran onto the court and tied herself by the neck to the net to save the planet.
articles.content: Doomsday prophets warning that the end is near used to be rare and fringy; now theyre cutting-edge climate activists. On Friday, during the third set at the French Open tennis tournament as Norways C… [+4284 chars]
